title: ExtraHop - Detections
description: This dashboard provides information about the Detection and Investigation logs generated on ExtraHop.

definition.content:
The ExtraHop system applies machine learning techniques and rule-based monitoring to your wire data to identify unusual behaviors and potential risks to the security and performance of your network. When anomalous behavior is identified, the ExtraHop system generates a detection and displays the available data and options.

This dashboard provides information about the Detection and Investigation logs generated on ExtraHop.

Detections can help you maintain your network in the following ways:
Collect high-quality, actionable data to find the root causes behind network issues.
Find unknown issues with performance or infrastructure.

Detections can help you defend your network in the following ways:
Identify malicious behavior that is associated with different attack categories or MITRE techniques.
View related detections or create your own investigation to group detections and track potential attack campaigns.
Flag suspicious IP addresses, hostnames, and URIs identified by threat intelligence.

For more information, see the [ExtraHop Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/extrahop/).

Tips:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Detection and Investigation logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security?query=source%3Aextrahop%20).
